definition: to lodge under another person's roof (idiom); to live relying on sb else's charity
to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: I have never been praised nor belittled; I am below no one.
sentences.chinese: 可我既沒受到讚揚也沒受到貶低，因爲我不寄人籬下。

sentences.english: Small Hei Yang lives ovine life, often sad weep.
sentences.chinese: 小黑羊過着寄人籬下的日子，經常傷心落淚。

sentences.english: You know the bitter taste of living under somebody else's thumb.
sentences.chinese: 你們知道，寄人籬下的生活是不好受的。
